name: Bunny War
description:
This is a computer adaptation of board game Bunny War created by L. Lynn Smith in 2001.

The goal is to capture at least 15 opponent's bunnies. Each bunny can move over arbitrary number of free spaces diagonally or orthogonally.

It is a two player game. You can choose a human or a computer player in the options. 

For detailed information about the game and its rules look into included BunnyWarHelp file. Either display it manually or from the game by pressing F1.

The game targets Windows XP or newer 32 bit systems. All feedback is welcome.
